x_nuvo_diag_probes.description:
This probe reminds users to make sure that the CAD Layers Translation name defined on the server matches up with the CAD layer names coming from each of the dxf/dwg files.
CAD Layers Translation vs CAD Layer related list on CAD record details
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: CAD layer Naming Mismatch
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: The value in the Name field of the CAD Layers Translation record needs to be the same as the name of the layer on the dxf/dwg file.

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_28716494db3c51505f598b0505961934
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><description>This probe reminds users to make sure that the CAD Layers Translation name defined on the server matches up with the CAD layer names coming from each of the dxf/dwg files.

CAD Layers Translation vs CAD Layer related list on CAD record details</description><healthcheck_type/><name>CAD layer Naming Mismatch</name><order>100</order><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation>The value in the Name field of the CAD Layers Translation record needs to be the same as the name of the layer on the dxf/dwg file. </remediation><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();
var layerGR = new GlideRecord('x_nuvo_eam_dxf_layers_translation');
layerGR.addEncodedQuery('space_profile_layer_type=0^ORspace_profile_layer_type=4'); //checks for polyline and space code layers
layerGR.addActiveQuery();
layerGR.query();
if (layerGR.getRowCount() < 1){
util.handleOutput('Check to make sure that your CAD Layers Translations records are active and have names that are an EXACT match to the layers on your CAD drawing.', 'Warning', 'Cad Extension');
}]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jake.ye@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-15 19:47:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>28716494db3c51505f598b0505961934</sys_id><sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CAD layer Naming Mismatch</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_28716494db3c51505f598b0505961934</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:27</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
